## Pre-launch Checklist

* [ ] I run dart format.
* [ ] I checked dart analysis.
* [ ] I run build_runner all.
* [ ] I run Android, iOS success.
* [ ] I remove all debug log.
* [ ] All existing and new tests are passing.
